specialities.name: Lotek
specialities.body: Our specialities since 1953. Beansprouts, Cabbage, Water Spinach, blended with peanut sauce, with a hint of aromatic ginger (kencur). Comes with non-spicy | medium | extra spicy options.

specialities.name: Nasi Rames
specialities.body: Tender slow cooked beef with rendang paste, vegetables, egg, cucumber. Served with warm rice and Kerupuk.

drinks.name: Various Kolak
drinks.body: Mix and match our sweet desserts, with homemade coconut puree.
drinks.ingredients: Pisang, Bubur Sagurangi, Caca, Pacar, Bubur Jali, Bubur Ketan Hitam, Bubur Kacang Hijau, Candil ...
